description: Plugin for the RabbitMQ message broker

paramSchema.title: RabbitMQ status port
paramSchema.name: rabbitMQPort
paramSchema.description: Port number of the RabbitMQ management server

paramSchema.title: RabbitMQ user
paramSchema.name: rabbitMQUser
paramSchema.description: User name for RabbitMQ management server

paramSchema.title: Poll Time (msec)
paramSchema.name: pollInterval
paramSchema.description: The Poll Interval to call the command. Defaults 5 seconds
